unique_passive_1: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 15 magic damage per second to nearby enemies, increased by 50% against minions and monsters. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage.

Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 13 (+ 0.5% bonus health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies, increased by 25% against minions and monsters. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage.

Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 12 (+ 1% bonus health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies, increased by 25% against minions and monsters. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage.
Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 12 (+ 1% bonus health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies, increased by 25% against minions and monsters.
Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 12 (+ 1% bonus health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies, increased by 25% against minions and 50% against monsters.
motd:
Hotfix: • Immolate base damage reduced to 12 from 15

  • Bonus minion damage reduced to 25% from 50%

  • Bonus monster damage reduced to 50% from 100%
Bugfix: Passive damage properly scales with Kled's bonus health.
Bugfix: Approaching and triggering Heimerdinger's turrets no longer triggers Immolate.

unique_passive_1: Deals 6 – 23 (based on level) magic damage per second to nearby enemies (325 range). Hitting an enemy with an  immobilizing ability deals 6 – 23 (based on level) (+ 1% bonus health) bonus magic damage and releases a fire nova that also deals that bonus damage to nearby enemies (12 second cooldown). Immolate's damage is increased by 100% against  minions and  monsters.
motd:
Hotfix: • Cooldown increased to 12 seconds from 10.

  • Health ratio reduced to 1% bonus health from 2%.
Change: Immolate can now kill non-buff camp large monsters.
Change: Aura range type changed to edge to center from center to center.

unique_passive_1: Deals 6 – 23 (based on level) magic damage per second to nearby enemies in 325 radius. Deals 100% bonus damage to minions and monsters.
Deals 6 – 23 (based on level) magic damage per second to nearby enemies in 325 radius. Deals 50% bonus damage to minions and monsters.
Deals 6 – 23 (based on level) magic damage per second to nearby enemies in 400 radius. Deals 50% bonus damage to minions and monsters.
